de.mrapp.android.adapter

Interface ExpandableGridViewAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Adapter<android.widget.ExpandableListView>, java.lang.Cloneable, DataStructure, Loggable, Parameterizable, Restorable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>, ExpandableRecyclerViewAdapter, MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>, NoChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>, SelectableExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>, SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEnableStateExpandableListAdapter, AbstractExpandableListAdapter, AbstractFilterableExpandableListAdapter, AbstractItemStateExpandableListAdapter, AbstractSelectableExpandableListAdapter, AbstractSortableExpandableListAdapter, ExpandableListAdapterImplementation, MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapterImplementation, SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapterImplementation

    public interface ExpandableGridViewAdapter
extends Adapter<android.widget.ExpandableListView>
    Defines the interface, all adapters, which can be attached to an ExpandableGridView, must implement.
    Since:
    0.5.0
